channel.title: Decimation - in Beta
channel.description:
To play the Decimation Beta, you must be registered on our forums - therefore you [b]must use forum login information[/b] to log in. To register on the forums, you may do so by visiting:
[COLOR=Red][SIZE=3]REGISTER:[/color] [url=http://decimation-bh.com/register.php]http://decimation-bh.com/register.php[/url] [COLOR=Red][SIZE=3]PLAY:[/SIZE][/COLOR] [url=http://www.decimation-bh.com/play]http://www.decimation-bh.com/play[/url] [COLOR=Red][SIZE=3]DOWNLOAD:[/SIZE][/COLOR][URL=http://"http://www.decimation-bh.com/play.zip"]http://www.decimation-bh.com/play.zip[/URL]
[center][COLOR=BLUE][SIZE=5]Featured Video:[/size][/color]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qa0FazJnyDE
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/zl5jtl.png[/img][/center]
[COLOR=Red]Credits:[/COLOR] 1) Dementhium Team
[ul][li]Lumby[/li] [li][Mystic Flow[/li] [li]Steve[/li] [li]Emperor[/li][/ul]
2) Impulser

item.title: Decimation - in Beta
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Thread cleaned again. Like Si Force said, if you want to continue arguing after the initial accusation, please PM a moderator with some real proof. Our main concern is if this server is malicious or bringing malicious activities to our forum. A url redirect isn’t much proof, if that’s all you have.

Read full topic

item.title: Decimation - in Beta
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

@RiiPiiNFtW We cannot and will not take action against any member without proof of their misdeed. It’s not how it works on these forums. However we also don’t like having ‘hackers’ on our forums, so if you can provide proof of this then please do.

Read full topic

item.title: Decimation - in Beta
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

Prayer can now be set to 52, after that level, it must be trained using bones.
Barrows drop rate increased to 1/3
Slayer coin casket reward raised to: Slayer level * points invested * 180
Starter package increased to 3m, 2 rune sets, a d’hide set, 2 mystic sets, barrage runes, and a few bolts with a rune crossbow.
Whip/DFS/Godsword Drop Rate Increased.
Censor system implemented.

Contributors get a 10% bonus in drop rates now.

Rares will be dropped on the 28th of October, 10 days from now. (Weekend before Halloween)
Stay posted for updates and exactly what rares I’ll be dropping + the amount of rares I’ll be dropping.

I’ll be introducing more and more updates like these to temporarily loosen up the economy so people can have an easier time getting items and getting more players active on the game. The drop rates will be re-adjusted once enough of them have been introduced into the game.

You can also check out our server on:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=blank1337.no-ip.biz

Read full topic

item.title: Decimation - in Beta

Terrible server… everyone has 100b+ in items and cash? and the xp rates are dreadfully slow… + when you go pking you’ll be in your 500k gear that you got given when joining and someone in max mage + max melee will just prod you…

Read full topic

item.title: Decimation - in Beta
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

Another advert video posted by a friend:

You can purchase contributor by clicking the “Donate” button next to the Vote button, or visiting: http://www.decimation-bh.com/payments.php

You can specify who you wish to pay for
NOTE: Your ingame name MUST equal your forum name. This system is automated.

Contributors get the commands:

::home
::yell
:: openbank

They also get access to this shop:

nex69s.png779×543

  • All 4 dose potions
  • Sanfew serums (Anti posion + Super restore in one)
  • Crystal Items
  • Tyras Helms
  • Wyvern bones (for prayer)
  • Emerald Bolts

Additional bolts/items/equipment will be added to the shop as time goes on.

I will also be adding reduced shop prices/drop rates in the future once I come up with a reasonable formula. Was sort of in a rush to add contributor so that’s why there’s not a load of content for them yet.

Sanfew serums should have their right effect now (restoring prayer)
Zamorak brews have been added to the contributor shop.

A voting system has been put in place (sorry to the people who initially voted and it was glitched for them, this has been fixed)

Here is some media of the vote system, to claim your reward do ::claim in-game after voting.
You can vote at http://decimation-bh.com/vote


A vote shop will soon be added for the vote tickets to be spent.

Read full topic

item.title: Decimation - in Beta
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

Bit more media, a lot of people like to upload videos

  • Obsidian items given higher prices in BH - They should have the right skull displaying now for their worth

  • Glitch where items would be displayed for other people if 2 people died at same time fixed

  • Walking queue resets on death if you are running (AKA if you get hit and you’re running the loot would appear a few steps farther away then it should)

  • Dragon bolt spec buffed (Anti d-shield/DFS protect from the spec)

  • Dragon bolts raised to 3 points in the slayer shop

  • Melee accuracy lowered

  • Granite maul spec accuracy lowered

  • Auto-cast displaying on the interface but not actually auto-casting in combat is fixed

  • All items in the BH point shop 1.5x’ed in price (only the items costing BH points E.G Mage book, Master wand etc)

  • Melee attack distance lowered when opponent is running away

  • Kree’Aara buffed

  • D’bow special buffed

  • Pickup Penalty should not reset anymore

  • BH Caskets re-added to the bounty hunter point shop, the amount of money you get from a casket is equal to: (Target kills (capped at 100) * points spent * 1000)

  • Death is paying us a visit early this Halloween as well!

wjb9d1.png755×497

Msb max hit fixed
G-maul spec not working fixed
Crater leaving taking a lot of clicks should be fixed.
Dragon bolt spec spec chance lowered.
Abyssal whip drop late SLIGHTLY increased.
Bounty hunter caskets should give the right amount of GP now.
Adjusted switching timer.
Verac set effect chance increased.

Barrows chance of getting items slightly increased temporarily.

Read full topic
